item.description:
This debate, moderated by Bronnie Kush of the Worcester Telegram and Gazette, is between Greater Worcester Humanists and the Chesterton Society (a Christian intellectual group), with the topic being "Christianity or Humanism: Which offers the better hope for humanity?" GWH members Brian Seitzman and Dave Niose will debate two Chesterton members. This will be a lively evening to be sure!

The public is welcome and admission is free. Doors open at 6:30 PM, with the debate to begin at 7:00 PM.
item.name: GWH Debate with the Chesterson Society
